    • Method Detail

      • createSchedulerFor

        public static GcmScheduler createSchedulerFor(android.content.Context appContext,
                              java.lang.Class<? extends GcmJobSchedulerService> klass)
        Creates a scheduler for the given service. Keep in mind that there is a strict 1-1 mapping between the created scheduler and the service. You should pass the returned scheduler to the JobManager configuration.
        Parameters:
        appContext - The application context
        klass - The service implementation that extends GcmJobSchedulerService.
        Returns:
        A scheduler that is associated with the given service class.
